title: Volcanic eruptions - people affected worldwide up to 2016
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of victims for 10 number of Location and Dates.

The Number of victims is appeared to be the highest at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) and lowest at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002).

There is a difference of 898925.0 between the maximum Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) and minimum Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002).
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Location and Date, and Number of victims in each Location and Date on the y axis.
Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) has the highest Number of victims and Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002) has the lowest Number of victims.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of victims for 10 number of Location and Dates.

The Number of victims is appeared to be the highest at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) and lowest at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002).

There is a difference of 898925.0 between the maximum Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) and minimum Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002).
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Location and Date in the x axis and Number of victims in the y axis.
Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) has the highest Number of victims and Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002) has the lowest Number of victims.
The second highest Number of victims is appeared to be the Location and Date Volcano eruption in Ecuador (August 14 2015).
The difference of Number of victims between the highest and lowest Location and Date is 898925.0.

Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) is higher than any other Location and Dates with value 1036065.0, followed by Volcano eruption in Ecuador (August 14 2015), and Volcanic eruption in Nicaragua (April 9 1992). Down to Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002) with the lowest value 137140.0.
The Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) tends to be 2.81 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Location and Dates, we get total 3685304.0.

data.Location and Date: Volcanic eruption in Papua New Guinea (September 19 1994)
